q: An alloy of magnesium, copper, and zinc contains 90% zinc, 7% magnesium, and 3% silver. A second alloy of zinc and copper only is melted with the first and the mixture contains 85% of zinc, 5% of magnesium, and 10% of copper. Determine the percentage of zinc in the second alloy?

Water can be prepared by Hydrogen and Oxygen. The price of hydrogen is thrice the price of Oxygen. Some people sell the water at Rs.2160 per 10L, thereby making a profit of 20%. If the ratio of Hydrogen and Oxygen in the mixture be 2:3. Determine the cost price of Hydrogen?

An alloy of copper and zinc is taken in the ratio of 1:2, and another alloy of the same metals is taken in the ratio of 2:3. How many parts of the two alloys must be taken to obtain a new alloy consisting of copper and zinc that are in the ratio 3:5?

Alice, Ben, and Bob purchased sweets from a candy shop. The number of sweets of Alice and Ben is respectively 40% and 35% more than the number of sweets of Bob. What is the ratio of the number of sweets Alice and Ben had?

You want to distribute masks and sanitizers among 4 people Alice, Ben, Bob, Tara and you divided it in the proportion of 6:5:4:1. If Bob gets 60 masks and sanitizers more than Tara, then how many does Alice gets?

The salaries of Alice, Ben, and Bob are in the ratio 1:2:5. The company gained some profit and want to increase the salaries of each employee by 5%, 5%, and 6% respectively. What will be the ratio of the increased salaries?

You are working in a organization where you have 3 departments. The number of employees in those three departments is in the ratio 2:3:4. If 12 employees are increased in each department the ratio changes to 8:11:14. Determine the total number of employees in the beginning?

In an organization, the number of female employees is 40% more than that of male employees. The total number of employees working over there is 72. If 3 more female employees are admitted to the organization, determine the ratio of the number of male employees to that of the female?
You have a collection of 120 stationery items where the ratio of pen and notebooks was 3:2. If you want this ratio to be 2:3, then determine the number of notebooks to be further added?
If 0.25:a::5:7, then what is the value of a?

You are filling a large bowl with a solution made up of 10 parts of water and 5 parts of syrup. How much of the mixture should be drawn out of the bowl and replaced with syrup so that the mixture is half water and half syrup?
Note: Assume that the bowl contains 15 liters of solution.

In what ratio should a vendor mix water with milk to gain 12 2/3% on selling the mixture at cost price?
Note: Choose the option that coincides with the nearest integer.

A student gets an aggregate of 60% marks in five subjects in the ratio 8:7:6:5:4. The passing marks are 40% of the maximum marks and each subject has the same maximum marks. In the given context, how many subjects did the student pass?
The ratio of the time taken by three motorbikes to cover a particular distance is 3: 6: 9. Determine the ratio of the speeds of the bikes over the same distance?

The ratio of the score obtained by the two students is 4:3. The combined average of their score percent is 100 and the score obtained is 1400.
What is the total score of the exam conducted?

A YouTuber decides to launch limited edition merchandise that includes bags, shoes, and jackets. In 2018, she launches the merchandise in the ratio 2:3:4, respectively. In 2019, she removes 'n' items from each type of merchandise launched in 2018 so that the new ratio is 3:5:7.
Similarly, in 2020, she removes 10 items from each type of merchandise produced in 2019 so that the ratio 1:2:3.
What is the total number of items that were removed from the merchandise launched in 2019?

Mango A worth Rs 130/kg and mango B worth Rs 120/kg is mixed with the third variety C in the ratio 1:1:2.
If the mixture is worth Rs 160, what is the price of the variety C mango?

Four glasses of sizes 2 units, 8 units, 12 units, and 16 units contain a mixture of juice & water in the ratio 1 : 1, 3 : 5, 7 : 5, and 9 : 7, respectively. The contents of all four glasses are poured into a single jar. Determine the ratio of juice & water in the resultant mixture?

Alice and Mary are two sisters who collect stamps as a hobby and have a total collection in the ratio 6:12, respectively. Mary gave some of her stamps to Alice and the ratio of the total collection of stamps changed to 7:8.
In the given context, determine the fraction of stamps that Mary gave to Alice from her original collection.

A coaching institute provides physics and mathematics classes to a group of students. The institute has male and female students in the ratio of 5:4 and a male student population of 1175.
Suppose, a few weeks later a group of male students join the institute and the ratio of male to female students becomes 3:2. What would the number of male students who joined the institute later be?
